parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce. From ek and ballo; to eject.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Without, outside. Adverb from ek; out(-side, of doors), literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; properly, to lead; by implication, to bring, drive, go, pass, or induce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
The brow, a ridge (of a mountain). Perhaps from optanomai; the eye-'brow' or forehead, i.e. the brink of a precipice.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A mountain, hill. Probably from an obsolete oro; a mountain: -hill, mount(-ain).
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.
So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.

word: to throw Him over the cliff.
str2: To cast down headlong, throw over a precipice. From kata and a derivative of kremnos; to precipitate down.
